GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.22 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
dlm: fix plock invalid read

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 56aa8d1fbd02357f3bf81bdfba1cde87ce8402fc, it was introduced in version v2.6.22 by commit 586759f03e2e9031ac5589912a51a909ed53c30a. For more details please see the references link.
